metadata.title: CVE-2022-40023 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Sqlalchemy mako before 1.2.2 is vulnerable to Regular expression Denial ofService when using the Lexer class to parse. This also affects babelpluginand linguaplugin.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-40023` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-mako - 1.1.0+ds1-1ubuntu2.1
python3-mako - 1.1.0+ds1-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mako package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.0+ds1-1ubuntu2.1').
